message.body: Yo sharkbait, I need a price on a cake. Nintendo paddle cake. I'll send a pic thru fb
It's sent, check messenger
Maybe a half sheet size I guess
Got it.. I think the half sheet is about 14x19"... ill price it up and get back to you tomorrow bec im working til midnight tonight
When do you need it by?
Sat the 15th
What time on sat?
Um, like 4 I guess. I have to make sure the price is ok with the girl who's throwing the party tho

That's fine. .. I need to know time bec I work sats til about 3 so needed to know if its pick up/delivery sat after I get done work or or if pick up/delivery Friday night instead and bec id have to take off my night job to do it lol.
But Ill let you know price tomorrow
Ok, thanks. That Lil guy don't have to be on top if it's too hard

Well for that it would just be a cake topper or figurine since I don't use fondant if she wants it. I would buy it and then just charge for the cost of it or she can even get one herself. Ill give you a price without the topper and prices with one that way she can decide what she wants
Omg, u can do that without using fondant??
Ahaha yea I only use icing. If I can't make it out of icing or candy/cake then I buy a topper
Fondant tastes nasty so I refuse to use it. I only sell what tastes good lol
Hey do you know if the cake is choc or vanilla? Marble or half and half?
Umm, half n half I guess

Ok tell her $60 (without cake topper). And just let me know by tomorrow if she wants it bec I need to give my boss my schedule for this upcoming week. If she wants it I gotta take off a day, if not ill tell him I can work
Ok, and it will be a half sheet size? And it'll definitely look ok without being done in fondant? I'm just worried about the details on it. But I'll defi
nitely let u know by tomorrow afternoon. I kinda have to sneak to text her cause he's nosey
Yea will definitely look good without fondant lol. Look at my Facebook. I did an xbox system with only icing.
I just looked at ur pics....i didn't see it
But ill definitely let u know. U know I'm old and forgetful, so if I don't text u by noon u text me
Oh, I saw it. That yoshi cake tho!!!! Omg
Will do
I hand drew yoshi on the cake
